author: Rachel Riga
title: Queensland coronavirus measures to include on-the-spot fines and more telehealth appointments
description: Queensland will expand its telehealth system and crack down on people flouting self-isolation orders in a bid to keep coronavirus patients at home.
content:
Posted 
March 28, 2020 16:24:03
Queensland will expand its telehealth system and crack down on people flouting self-isolation orders in a bid to keep coronavirus patients at home, the State Government says.
